mapper.insert: insert into owner(o_sNumber, o_pw, o_phone, o_name, o_cellPhone, o_address, o_date, o_time, o_image) values (#{o_sNumber}, #{o_pw}, #{o_phone}, #{o_name}, #{o_cellPhone}, #{o_address}, #{o_date}, #{o_time}, #{o_image})

insert into goods(g_owner, g_name, g_price, g_discount, g_detail, g_image, g_expireDate, g_category) values (#{g_owner}, #{g_name}, #{g_price}, #{g_discount}, #{g_detail}, #{g_image}, #{g_expireDate}, #{g_category})
